mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID_ AS id, t1.TYPE_ AS type, t1.TIME_ AS time, t1.USER_ID_ AS userId, t2.FIRST_ AS userName, t1.TASK_ID_ AS taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.MESSAGE_ AS message, CONVERT (FULL_MSG_ USING utf8) AS fullMsg, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefkey FROM ACT_HI_COMMENT t1 LEFT JOIN ACT_ID_USER t2 ON t1.USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_TASKINST t3 ON t1.TASK_ID_ = t3.ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{value} and ACTION_='AddComment' ORDER BY t1.TIME_ ASC
